ModMetaData.name: Oberon's Heavy Industry
ModMetaData.author: Oberon
ModMetaData.description:
V0.1 Adds heavy industry buildings and research projects to RimWorld:
* AC Power, a research project that replaces several vanilla power research projects. * Construction crane, a building that must be installed near certain construction projects in order for pawns to work on them.
Preview icon, and others, made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
